sections.text:
2005 Repeal Note.

Chapter 13 (§§ 1301 - 1302) was added July 7, 2005, P.L.201, No.44, and repealed November 16, 2005, P.L.385, No.72, effective immediately. Similar subject matter is now contained in the act of September 30, 1983, P.L.160, No.39, known as the Public Official Compensation Law.
